mapper.insert: insert into tb_store(name, address, lat, lng, createdate) values(#{name}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, now())
insert into tb_evaluation(store_no, comment, star, user_no, createdate) values(#{store_no}, #{comment}, #{star}, #{user_no}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_evaluation where store_no = #{store_no}
select round(avg(star), 2) from tb_evaluation where store_no = #{store_no}

select substring(u.email, 1, 4) as email, e.comment as comment, e.createdate as createdate, e.star as star from tb_evaluation as e, tb_user as u where e.user_no = u.no and store_no = #{store_no} order by e.no desc limit #{start}, #{pagecnt}
